pages.text: Are you part of the Royal Army?$(br2)Well if you are, then gold is a good fit for you. Otherwise its an expensive way to make bullets that are generally poor in battles. Its often better to go for $(l:ammunition/copper_musket_ball)copper musket balls$(), which are not only cheaper, but deal more damage.
$(o)Deals $(l)2.30$()$(o) base damage. See $(l:ammunition/bullet_velocities_info)Guide: Bullet Damage$()$(o) for more information.
